com.example.myapplication

Class KalmanFilterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.myapplication.KalmanFilterManager

  • public class KalmanFilterManager
extends java.lang.Object
    class that handle all logic behind the Kalman Filter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KalmanFilterManager(double position, double speed)
      constructor for the kalman filter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KalmanFilterManager

        public KalmanFilterManager(double position,
                           double speed)
        constructor for the kalman filter. Initialises all of the matrices and sets the default values.
        Parameters:
        position - - (latitude/longitude) location values in meters.
        speed - - current speed from accelerometer in one direction, depending on the lat or long thats passed in.

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        public void predict(double absoluteAcc)
        predict function of the kalman filter. creates estimations of the state of the system in the future.
        Parameters:
        absoluteAcc - - absolute acceleration value passed in to predict.

      • update

        public void update(double position,
                   double speed,
                   double accuracy)
        update function of the kalman filter. Uses the predicted values alongside current values to correct location values. Also sets up matrices for the next predict stage.
        Parameters:
        position - - current lat/long value.
        speed - - current speed value in one direction.
        accuracy - - accuracy of the location.

      • getPoint

        public double getPoint()
